abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide (a)
            foreign exchange for imports of essential capital,
            intermediate goods and raw materials for the public and
            private sectors; and (b) the use of the counterpart funds
            stemming from such import financing for expenditures on
            certain votes of the Government's 1976/77 and 1877/78
            development budgets which are not otherwise financed from
            foreign sources.
